name: Getting Lost in Your Own Madness
name_original: Getting Lost in Your Own Madness
description:
Your objective: find the key, then the door. In this game, actions are connected; each movement or action cuts off some options while opening others. 

Controls:

  • Arrow keys: Move
  • Space bar: Torch
  • "B" key: Interact
  • "V" key: Destroy stones
  • Enter key: Hide key overlay

Game design engine used: Godot
Visual assets and Code designed by: Millium8
